title: News: Mercury Prize 2012 Shortlist Revealed
content:
One of the most prestigious awards in music, the Barclaycard Mercury Prize celebrates it’s twentieth year in 2012.

Having previously been won by the likes of Primal Scream, Pulp and The XX, the award chosen by a panel of musicians, music executives, journalists and other figures in the music industry in the UK and Ireland was won by PJ Harvey in 2011, making history as the first artist to claim the title twice. With a history of favoring the underdog, the 2012 nominee list was announced earlier tonight, featuring the likes of Alt-J, Michael Kiwanuka and Jessie Ware. Check out the full list below. The overall winner of the 2012 Prize will be announced at the Barclaycard Mercury Prize Awards Show at the Roundhouse on Thursday 1 November 2012. Vote for who you think should win over at our Facebook page.

Alt-J                             An Awesome Wave
Ben Howard                 Every Kingdom
Django Django             Django Django
Field Music                   Plumb
Jessie Ware                 Devotion
Lianne La Havas          Is Your Love Big Enough?
Michael Kiwanuka        Home Again
Plan B                           Ill Manors
Richard Hawley            Standing at the Sky’s Edge
Roller Trio                     Roller Trio
Sam Lee                       Ground of its Own
The Maccabees            Given to the Wild
